description.short: Compare documents to identify gaps using AI
description.full:
The Gap Analysis Agent is an AI-powered Microsoft Teams bot that helps you compare any two sets of documents to identify gaps, discrepancies, and missing items.

**Key Features:**
• Upload PDF, Word, or Text documents directly in Teams
• Paste text content for quick comparisons
• Define custom analysis objectives
• Get detailed gap reports with matched items, missing items, and recommendations
• Powered by Azure OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for intelligent analysis

**Use Cases:**
• Compare requirements vs implementation documents
• Analyze job descriptions vs resumes
• Review compliance documents vs current processes
• Audit standards vs actual documentation

**How to Use:**
1. Type 'start' to begin
2. Choose to upload files or paste text
3. Provide Document A (source) and Document B (target)
4. Set your analysis objective
5. Review the comprehensive gap analysis report

Built with M365 Agents SDK for seamless Teams integration.
